mapper.select: SELECT a.noti_id , a.notice_title , a.rgst_user_id , b.user_name , a.rgst_dtm FROM notice_list a, user_info b WHERE a.rgst_user_id = b.user_id ORDER BY a.rgst_dtm DESC

SELECT a.noti_id , a.notice_title , a.rgst_user_id , b.user_name , a.rgst_dtm FROM notice_list a, user_info b WHERE a.rgst_user_id = b.user_id
AND a.notice_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{notice_title}, '%')
AND b.user_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{user_name}, '%')
ORDER BY a.rgst_dtm DESC
SELECT a.noti_id , a.notice_title , a.notice_description , a.rgst_user_id , b.user_name , a.rgst_dtm FROM notice_list a, user_info b WHERE a.noti_id = #{noti_id}
